name: ol3-layerswitcher
description: Grouped layer list control for an OpenLayers map.

scripts.dev-for-examples: npm run build-for-examples && start npm run live-for-examples && start npm run build-for-examples -- -w
scripts.examples: npm run build-for-examples && npm run live-for-examples
scripts.dev-for-tests: npm run build-for-tests & start npm run live-for-tests & npm run build-for-tests -- -w
scripts.build: npm run build-for-loaders && npm run build-for-amd && npm run build-for-tests && npm run build-for-examples
scripts.before-push: npm run clean && npm run build && mv built/index.max.d.ts built/index.d.ts
scripts.test: npm run before-push && npm run live-for-tests

author: coreyalix@hotmail.com
